title: 3/14 mod releases
content:
Down at Keen:Modding, 3/14 was celebrated with the release of several '1 level mods' consisting of only 1 level [duh] Among the 1337ness are:

Oracle Janitor 2
[url=http://keengrid.net/ckfiles/modifications/oracle%20Janitor%202.zip]keengrid.net/ckfiles/modi...or%202.zip[/url]
Oracle Janitor is back! And ramsacking a monastary.

Torgopolis
[url=http://www.maguidhir.com/benvolio/benvolio_torg.zip]www.maguidhir.com/benvoli...o_torg.zip[/url]
Benvolios 2D Keen 4 mod

Xky's 1 Level mod
[url=http://www.angelfire.com/falcon/xkyrauh/Xky1Lev.zip]www.angelfire.com/falcon/...ky1Lev.zip[/url]
With such an inventive name, and given the maker, how can you resist?

The Generic mod
[url=http://www.freewebs.com/gannalev/Generic1.zip]www.freewebs.com/gannalev/Generic1.zip[/url]
Levellord made this; 'nuff said.

The Generic sequel
[url=http://www.freewebs.com/gannalev/Generic%202.zip]www.freewebs.com/gannalev...ic%202.zip[/url]
The sequel to the GM. Again, 'nuff said.

Norp 3.5: The Maze of Doom
[url=http://spatang.com/host/norpmaze.zip]spatang.com/host/norpmaze.zip[/url]
xtraverse's continuation of the Norp series

Go play them now and drown in Keenness!
A proud member of the signature stealing society


[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/antiror.jpg[/img]

"No one should be here.
" -Level Lord

title: Re: 3/14 mod releases
content: Ah, yeah. It was about time someone posts about those here as well. As well, I would move this topic to Other Keen Stuff if I could.. Cool stuff that is.You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: 3/14 mod releases
content: KR, these are games, are they not?  And they are unofficial, correct?  Anyways, it doesn't belong in either of those two forums, these are new releases after all.[url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/cosmo][img]http://spatang.com/cosmo/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/nukem][img]http://www.spatang.com/nukem/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Re: 3/14 mod releases
content:
No. They are NOT GAMES!!!!!!!!!!! At least I see it this way, and that's why I would move them to Other Keen Stuff, since there is all the other Keen stuff. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img]

Edit: But I forgot this new section, which is of course the best and dedicated for new releases. I would move that here instead, yeah. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-embarrassed.gif[/img] You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: 3/14 mod releases
content: I can't understand why some people keep them as unofficial games, since they are not that. :\ IMKO unofficial games are stuff that have their own executable to run, and therefore their own engine etc..You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: 3/14 mod releases
content:
A game is "an activity providing entertainment or amusement; a pastime" according to dictionary.com.

Well, I think mods fit that category, and they are certainly unofficial..[url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/cosmo][img]http://spatang.com/cosmo/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/nukem][img]http://www.spatang.com/nukem/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]
